pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 4 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Entities with certain enchantments on them, will have special effects on them, while you have this enchantment active. $(br)Piglins tolerate you, but Brutes do not
